column1: #Text=( German : Siders ) is a city in Central Valais .
#Text=While the city is in the French part of Valais , there is a large German-speaking population and you will encounter many people being fluent in both languages .
#Text=Sierre has a a rich cultural heritage but is also known for its wine .
#Text=There are half-hourly trains from Brig and Visp , as well as from Sion .
#Text=Half hourly regional trains connect to the smaller towns .
#Text=The is around 500 metres from the main station and links to Crans Montana .
#Text=From the A9 motorway north of the city , either exit Sierre-Ouest or Sierre-Est can be taken to access Sierre .
#Text=The city centre is quite compact and it is possible to walk to most places .
#Text=( Right outside the main entrance to the train station ) .
#Text=This building which serves today as town hall was built during the 17th century by Jean-François de Courten as a residence .
#Text=It served as a hotel for a long time , where a lot of famous people stayed for long periods .
#Text=A castle from the 15th century and Sierre 's oldest building .
#Text=The old church of Sierre , built in the 14th century .
#Text=This museum about all things wine is spread out over two villages , with one exposition in Sierre and a different one in nearby .
#Text=Both museums are linked by a 6 km long trail through vineyards .
#Text=Monday and Tuesday of the last or second last week of November .
#Text=( Around the Hôtel de Ville ) , ☏ +41274563144 , ✉ info@vinea.ch .
#Text=Wine fair showcasing wines from around Switzerland .
#Text=A museum dedicated to the work of the poet Rainer Maria Rilke .
#Text=It is situated in the 18th century Maison Pancrace de Courten .
#Text=This two-Michelin star restaurant is owned and operated by a renowned Swiss chef .
#Text=Offers special menus for vegetarians and other dietary restrictions .
#Text=Mains from Fr . 80 , set meal from Fr . 180 .
#Text=This wine-bar has a huge collection of wines from all over the Valais .
#Text=Take the funiculaire up to Crans Montana .
#Text=, the capital of the canton , is only 10 minutes away by train .
